meanings.sent1: He followed the instructions simplemindedly, without questioning anything.
meanings.sent2: She simplemindedly believed everything she heard without considering the source.
meanings.sent3: The robot simplemindedly repeated the same task over and over, unaware of its surroundings.
meanings.sent4: The old clock ticked simplemindedly, unaware of the changing world around it.
meanings.sent5: The child simplemindedly sang the same song repeatedly, finding comfort in its familiarity.

meanings.definition: With a lack of complexity or depth
meanings.sent1: His simplemindedly approach to problem-solving often led to quick solutions.
meanings.sent2: The story was simplemindedly written, lacking any twists or surprises.
meanings.sent3: The simplemindedly designed puzzle was quickly solved by the children.
meanings.sent4: Her simplemindedly decorated room had minimal furniture and plain walls.
meanings.sent5: The simplemindedly drawn picture of a house lacked any intricate details or colors.
